Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000156 affecting package patch for versions less than 2.7.6-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-1000156 affecting package patch for versions less than 2.7.6-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package patch is earlier than 2.7.6-9, affected by CVE-2018-1000156
